entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 9:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 56 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -15.5°C
Wind: NE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with ice pellets in the afternoon. Local blowing snow early in the morning. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Periods of ice pellets in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 10. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
